about.title: About Me
about.headline: Transforming Banking System Resilience into Strategic Data Intelligence.
about.bio: With over 15 years of experience in mission-critical systems within the banking sector (Bradesco), I specialized in ensuring technology supports high-stakes decision-making with 100% governance. Today, I apply this operational rigor to lead Data Science and Operational Efficiency projects, connecting complex infrastructures to actionable insights.

items.label: Operational Efficiency
items.description: Developed an automated IPV tax system that eliminated 2,920 annual hours of manual processing.

items.label: Critical Availability
items.description: Sustained corporate infrastructure for 500+ users with a 99.5% availability SLA.

items.label: Compliance & Data Privacy
items.description: Implemented interdepartmental legal systems with full traceability and LGPD/GDPR compliance.

items.label: Data Science
items.description: Python, SQL, and Machine Learning for predictive modeling and scenario analysis.

items.label: Big Data & Cloud
items.description: Azure Databricks and Azure Cloud for scalable and governed pipelines.

items.label: Relationship Intelligence
items.description: Neo4J (Graph Databases) applied to fraud detection and complex link analysis.

items.label: Governance
items.description: Specialist in regulated environments, data security, and banking auditing.

contact.title: Let's talk?
contact.sub: Available for strategic projects, technical leadership, and data consultancy.
